Description: Wall fragment of Attic black-glazed pottery open vase; thick-walled and fairly shallow; perhaps a lekanis. Wholly glazed. Incised inscription on inside.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Hellenion (Naukratis), From the area around Site 19 (Hogarth), the 'Aphrodite shrine' [see Hogarth et al. 1898-9,66]
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 90)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 703, no. 613)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1697)
